entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dease Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dease Lake Airport 1:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure: 103.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -28.4°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
